name: Macster
tagline: You're in a starbucks thinking about to build the next killer-app with node.js and mongodb but you don't have a mac?
body: macster ======= You're in a starbucks thinking about to build the next killer-app with node.js and mongodb but you don't have a *mac*? DON'T WORRY. **MACSTER** is here. *macster creates .DS_Store files for you.* "[Nicholas got a haircut](https://secure.flickr.com/photos/lovine/5433988749/)" by Paul Lovine. Used under a [Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs license](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/2.0/deed.en). installation ============== ``` git clone https://github.com/emre/macster.git python setup.py install ``` usage ========= creates .DS_Store in the "." folder recursively. ``` python -m macster ``` or you if you want a specific path to be macsterized: ``` python -m macster path ``` license ========== WTFPL
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
